#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;
#define FOR(i, n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)

int main(){
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--){
int n,m,p1,p2,s,p,q;
cin>>n>>m>>s>>p>>q;
p1=1;
p2=1;
int ans=0;
while(s--){
    p1+=p;
    p2+=q;
    while(p1>n){
        p1-=n-m+1;
    }
    while(p2>n){
        p2-=n-m+1;
    }
   // cout<<p1<<" "<<p2<<endl;
    if(p1==p2)ans++;
}
cout<<ans<<endl;



}}
